reviews.review: 内牛满面
Pure doses of fun, mind-blowing puzzle design and lots of laughter guaranteed by the amazing 2 player coop game mode. It's a must.
Play this game. For science. You monster.

Fun story and puzzle solving, what more can you ask for?
Fantastic co-op? They fot that covered too!
una parola: FENOMENALE!
Say no more?

Phenomenal and thoroughly enjoyable singleplayer, coupled with an equally enthralling co-op that satisfied both gaming and non-gaming personalities.

Buy it! BUY IT NOW!
A tester. le workshop donne accès a plus de niveaux
iz kool

他に例のないスタイルのパズルゲーム。やり出したら時間を忘れてプレーしてしまう。
話の導き手であるロボット達の会話も面白く、グイグイと引きこまれてしまうだろう。
ゲーム好きなら死ぬ前にやっておきたい名作の一つ。
Einfach nur geil :D

Fantastic script full of jokes, two great story campaigns, challenging puzzles, co-op is a blast, portal mechanic is ingenious, level designer included, just simply outstanding. One of the best games I've ever played.
Its like portal but IT's Portal 2. That means its like Portal x2

pretty short like portal 1 but I liked the ideas of the creators.

The puzzles where a bit too easy in my opinion.

coop should be fun!
You should buy this game. Totally not because i'm only doing this for the community badge. Totally.
Swietna gra polecam wszystkim co lubią łamigłówki !!

If you don't have this game, you should buy it.  If you can't afford it, you should buy it.  If you do have it, cover your companion cube's eyes and ears during some parts as GLaDOS can be quite mean to the poor guy...

Portal 2 is an amazing follow up from Valve. More great puzzles and humour from GLaDOS, Wheatley and Cave Johnson.  Valve trains players superbly with the new devices like hardlight bridges, excursion tunnels and the special goo. These are a great extension on the mechanics from the original

 What's better is the great co-op levels, these are almost as satisfying as the story puzzles. The game is perhaps only let down by replay value (I didn't enjoy replaying co-op levels) but it has made up for it by releasing a user friendly map editor that has produced hundreds of great levels to keep playing.
exellent jeux. Ambiance unique
I think I never played something like this game. This game is so smart and fast. I like it. I can say: I recommend the game for all of you.
Top Game
Jedna z lepszych gier w jakie grałem.
Мне очень понравилась эта игра,скарейбы вышел Portal 3!!!
Шикарнота, просто шикарнота

Just great.
That was insightful, huh?
Не дота, не кс - портал или халява. Лайк
портал =) что тут скажешь) must have))

Portal 2 is probably the most hilariously incredible game I've played.
Between the incredibly smooth gameplay, the great storyline, hilarious characters, and what s easily the best video game ending in history (some hyperbole may have spilled all over that last comment), Portal 2 has managed to far suprass its ground-breaking predecessor.

Play. This. Game.

Всё, что вы видели в первом Портале, только лучше!
Добавились новые физические штуки, с которыми взаимодействовать, уровни раздались в размерах, сюжет стал веселее и захватывающее (в какой-то момент Portal2 стал напоминать Bioshock - даже имена похожи: Rapture - Apperture).
Не изменилось только одно: вы, ваша портальная пушка и занимательные головоломки.
so much rawr.
yo like it really makes your brain work hard and stuff. like going to the gym for your head.
Just Awesome
awesome :)
Not much has to be said, this game is an amazing sequal.
"Я в космосе."
Это просто супер!
This game is great if you like puzzlers. And there is a bunch of achievements to earn once you finish the campaign.

Одна из лучших игр за последнее время.
Как только начинает казаться, что уже всё узнал - игра тут же преподносит что-то новенькое.
А финальный ролик - это вообще сказка ;)
great game highly recommend it!
Amazing Game
У вас высохли мозги, из за того что вы всё время за компом??? Ну тогда играйте эту игру она вам поможет с вашей проблемой)))

Even though it doesn't have the "WHOW, WHAT IS THAT!?!" factor that the original had, it's still one of the best games of 2011. A truly terrific sequel, filled with great leveles, gaming mechanics and of course...Cave Johnson. Don't miss this. It's one of the greats.
What's better than mind bending puzzles with a crazy mole man? Robot buddies playing mind bending puzzles with a insane computer boss lady...
Uma continuação seria boa!
Is best game of year.

Another early addition to my Steam library, having played the original Portal and enjoyed it, I naturally wanted the second game in the series.  This was also a good game and fun.  I haven't tried the co-op mode (maybe someday), but the single player portion was enjoyable.  If you like solving puzzles, you'll probably like this.
Co-op & custom maps makes this game the most replayable game I have ever played
Fun and you can fly through the air with your MIND POWERS. No, really just a portal gun.
not bad, interesting

Great game to exercise the brain. Lot's of replayability value with the community chambers. Voice acting by Stephen Merchant as Wheatley is hilarious, also Glados is just as entertaining. I highly recommend this game.

10/10
Uma da historias mais envolventes e divertidas dos games. Como sempre mais uma obra-prima da Valve!
This is the best game ever!
With the Co-op option, they made a beatiful game turn into a wonderful game <3

Portal 2 was brilliant! I can't... I can't actually think of a better word. No, wait! I've got it... stupenderrific! No, wait, that's not a word... but we can make it one! Or can we? No, no, definitely not. I do not have the power to edit the English dictionary... but I will, just as soon as we take over... whatever, um, organization that happens to control the... English dictionary.

Uso della materia grigia, buona longevità, la fisica lo rende adatto anche ai non amanti del platform. Come il più breve ma gustoso predecessore diverte parecchio e al contrario dei tanti allievi riesce a tenere sempre altà l'attenzione, anche se in questo senso il doppiaggio sarebbe stato un aggiunta non da poco. L'unico rammarico è che verso la fine si palesa un po il non voler ostacolare l'intuizione, con qualche dialogo allungato e un chekpoint finale francamente evitabile.
Идеальная игра. Прекрасно всё: геймплей, озвучка, юмор, сюжет, стиль... Особенно великолепен кооператив. Одназначно рекомендую всем и каждому.
Really entertaining!
jeux d'enigme par excellence

Vorweg, die mit unter genialsten Kurzclips :DD Hoffentlich erscheint irgendwann ein kompletter Film =) Zum Spiel selbst. Portal 1 war WOW! Portal 2 ist einfacher WOWer xD
Neue ingame features und die Coop Funktion geben dem alten Hit eine erfrischende Brise.
Portal 2 macht alles richtig. Selbstverständlich ein 'must have'  ! Zudem hat das Game mit unter den besten Audio Support [getestet: Englisch, Deutsch, Russisch] Hammer! (5/5)

Portal 2 is my favorite puzzle game, along with one of my favorite games of all time. There isn't much I can say without spoiling the experience. Needless to say, if you somehow haven't already played Portal 2 then you are missing out on one of gaming's best experiences.
Portal 2 is great !
Great game, especially for co-op.
The perfect VG. Period.
good game

clever, funny first person puzzle action
Una obra de arte.
still havent bought it? really?
Amongst the most awesome games i have ever played!
¡Imprescindible!
EPIC. It does what the amazing Portal did but it does i even better.

This game is the shit!

It also has one of the best video game endings ever.
Esse sim compre e seja feliz ! Paguei 50 obamas por apenas 3 tah mais que recomendado !
Awesome fun!
Hi it is a good game
An amazing accomplishment in gaming. Superb visuals and voice acting really make this title shine without losing the minimalistic and adored gameplay style of the original. A must-own!
Are there really people who wouldn't like this game?
ок ок игра в общем !

Not only is the single-player a great but breif excursion, and not only is the co-op a mind-bender that leads to empathetic frustration (and joy afterwards)... the not-exactly-new Perpetual Testing Initiative and the fact there's educational use make this an endless mass of puzzles that will delight for years (instead of a month or two as it once was.)
This game is sweet! Buy it now!
Portal 2!! If you've never played, play it!
Fantastic, brain-stimulating and engaging. The most important thing about it though is that it comes with great dose of humour. Loved the dialogues and voice acting.
Just open a orange portal above you, open a blue portal below you. Have fun!
Самая охуенная игра!! Ну не считая HL. =)

I played 1st and i like it but then bought this game cos i was hoping to get a cake since 1st one said it was all the lies that made me sad. :( So then i bought this one to really get a cake but again it seem to say Cake is lies again which again it made me sad for not getting the cake ;(

Now i have wait for 3rd game and then i hopefully will finally get a cake in the 3rd game :D
VALVe lay's another golden pota-egg! The puzzles, art, voice acting, storyline, and story telling are all just wonderful. You're just being silly if you haven't bought this game yet.

Although some of the over-difficult areas that required precise shooting and a creative use of momentum from the original game have been toned down in this sequel, the amazing dialogue and humour remains. In addition, the user created content and multiplatform co-op move this from a must-play to a must-buy.
Just get it.
10/10 - Game of the decade! Get it or try dying!

Pièges et énigmes développés, histoire et ambiance tout aussi travaillée et fidèle au concept, un vrai plaisir, à la durée de vie augmentée par les maps joueurs. Le magasin n'a pas vraiment sa place dans le jeu mais cela reste purement facultatif.
Excelente, best game ever
I want a badge. Game's good too, great even.
Best FPS ever without a proper gun to be seen!
SPAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Its awesome, play it now and pray for Portal 3.

Valveの作るゲームはどれも世界観が良く
パズルゲームと言ってもただ問題を解かせるだけではなく
裏にストーリー性や雰囲気を感じさせる作りになっています

このゲームは神ゲーであるPORTALの続編ですが
前作に負けず今作も非常に良い出来でした。

リリースされてからそれなりに経過していますが
その世界観のせいかグラフィックも決して古すぎる事はないと思います。

自分が購入した時はまだこのゲーム単品で1000円以上した気がしますが
今もしやってみようかなと思った場合はセール時に90%オフ位になる
Valve Complete Packを購入する事をお勧めします。

Une mine d 'or... Beaucoup d'humour, un univers épuré, un concept simple et pourtant ultra-addictif. Bref que du bonheur et plus puisque que le jeu a fait son entrée dans le Workshop. A bon entendeur ...
Eccezionale a dire poco :D
Witty and Funny!  Valve has done it again!
